channel.title: Status page problem
channel.description:
I have my server up at the moment, on the CMD screen. But I try to register my server, and it says it's offline. I log onto a server, so does a mate. And we can connect? So why's it saying it is offline when it is not.
EDIT; Your IP (IPHERE) does not match the server IP address (IP HERE). Please visit this page on the same computer as the server is being hosted on.
I'm hosting my server from my computer (For the moment) And it says that.

item.title: Status page problem
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:12, topic:366293"]So I have to make a new NO-IP[/quote]I would try that. If an error still persists:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:366293”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.0.html[/quote] and MITB will reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Status page problem
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:10, topic:366293"]Davidi2, what are you saying? I didn’t get it. My No-Ip is for my IP at the moment. I’m running No-Ip DUC 3.0 And my Ip is the same as ipchicken[/quote]The PHP is reading a different IP Address than the one your No-Ip redirects too.

Read full topic

item.title: Status page problem
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Davidi2, what are you saying? I didn’t get it. My No-Ip is for my IP at the moment. I’m running No-Ip DUC 3.0 And my Ip is the same as ipchicken

Read full topic

item.title: Status page problem
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:7, topic:366293"]I use my No-Ip for the status page, it worked the other day why would it not work now?

I’ll give you a hint for the IP

Your IP 94. 45 does not match the server IP address 94. 235. Please visit this page on the same computer as the server is being hosted on.[/quote]Ok, well that means your no-ip is set to the wrong IP Adress

Read full topic

item.title: Status page problem
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:5, topic:366293"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=462491.msg3383456#msg3383456 date=1288234115]
You need to be on the same computer that you’re hosting the server on when you add it to the status page. So, if you’re hosting on your computer, sign up your server on the SAME computer.
[/quote]

I’m hosting it from my comp and I register the server on my comp.[/quote]Then make sure you are using the correct IP address

Go to http://www.whatsmyip.org/ and use that address

Read full topic

You need to be on the same computer that you’re hosting the server on when you add it to the status page. So, if you’re hosting on your computer, sign up your server on the SAME computer.
